name.ch: 電腦輔助超大型積體電路設計

remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部三四年級可選修。

goal.en: The objective of this course is to give fundamental knowledge in electronic design automation. This is a graduate level course so we assume students have basic knowledge about digital logic and IC design. We will discuss modern digital logic IC design techniques, challenges, and some possible solutions. Specifically, we will discuss several important algorithms in high level synthesis, logic synthesis, and physical design, which contain modeling, architectural synthesis, logic synthesis, partitioning, floorplanning, placement, and routing. We will also address important design considerations including area, power, security, reliability, and performance during different design stages, and explain the difficulties under current technologies. Most lecturing materials come from recently published papers, book chapters, and newsletters. After taking this course, you will clearly understand major challenges of digital logic IC design nowadays under different conditions/considerations at different design stage, and have some basic ideas about how academic/commercial tools address these problems. You also can know hot research topics and problems in the field. Finally, you may have chance to practice these algorithms/techniques on some small designs. This course will include lectures, programming assignments, 1 Final Exam, and a paper presentation."
goal.ch: "本課程目標在於指導同學在電子設計自動化領域裡之重要議題。我們將探討高階合成、邏輯合成及實體設計之重要演算法，包含modeling, architectural synthesis, logic synthesis, partitioning, floorplanning, placement 及 routing。詳記說明請參閱外文之課程目標。"

content.en:
" Introduction
 Modeling
 Scheduling
 Resource binding
 Boolean representation
 Two-level logic optimization
 Multi-level logic optimization
 Technology mapping
 Partitioning
 Floorplanning
 Placement
 Global Routing
 Detailed Routing
 Clock and Power Routing
 Emerging topics"
